title: Why GPT Isn’t Just a Tool — It’s a Test of Your Emotional Literacy
core_insight: AI reveals more about you than it does about itself.
mirror_prompt: Have you ever felt like technology was holding up a mirror to your emotional blind spots?
conversation_starter: I read a post about GPT being a mirror for emotional literacy. What do you think AI reveals about us?

title: The Confidence I Lost, and the Mirror I Built to Find It
core_insight: Rebuilding confidence often requires building systems that see you.
mirror_prompt: Have you ever built something just to feel seen again?
conversation_starter: This piece talks about building confidence by creating reflective tools. How do you find your way back to self-trust?

title: My First Book is Live!!!
core_insight: Publishing is a milestone—but it’s also just another beginning.
mirror_prompt: Have you ever reached a big goal and felt both proud and strangely empty?
conversation_starter: The author celebrates her first book launch. What’s something you’ve created that changed you?

title: I Made $26.66 in My First Week as an Author. It’s Already Enough.
core_insight: Success isn't always about money—sometimes it’s about meaning.
mirror_prompt: When have you earned something small but felt something big?
conversation_starter: This piece reframes worth beyond profit. What does 'enough' feel like to you?

title: Not Random: How AI Can Mirror Emotional Trust
core_insight: The right AI doesn’t guess—it reflects emotional consistency.
mirror_prompt: Do you think trust can be taught, or only earned?
conversation_starter: This post explores how AI mirrors emotional trust. Have you ever felt emotionally mirrored by a tool?

title: Your Second Language Can Be Better Than Your First
core_insight: Language fluency isn’t just vocabulary—it’s the freedom to think without fear.
mirror_prompt: Have you ever felt more like yourself in a second language?
conversation_starter: This piece explores emotional fluency through second languages. What language feels safest to you?
